String.string: Use the spell Mutate on a monster.
When surrounded, use Fear or Stun.
Ghosts are emerging from the coffin. Close the coffin!
To defeat the zomporis, mix a potion into their feast.
The blood priest is impervious to damage. Destroy the altar to defeat him.
You can only damage the altar with Punish.
Use spells to destroy the door.
The blood priest is performing a ritual. Get to the Ceremonial Room and stop him.
You have successfully interrupted the Banquet of Blood.
